name: Software Engineer (Remote)
description:
About the job

Lexense is on a mission to rebuild the way justice is being served. Our data-driven platform allows our clients to easily exercise their legal rights by unlocking the access to the court system. We provide an end-to-end solution by combining the technology, funding and expertise needed to resolve any civil case efficiently.

We are looking for highly motivated, unique individuals to join our company for the next phase of our fast moving story.

This Software Engineer role is an opportunity to be one of the first employees to join the team and make a significant impact. Through impeccable software, you will help our customers solve one of the biggest pain points they have encountered, making their life better.

Responsibilities:

  • Build the next generation of web applications.
  • Work with cutting-edge technologies, building isomorphic JS applications.
  • Design and develop overall architecture of both web applications and services
  • Collaborate directly with Tech and Product Leads to develop and maintain cutting edge software
  • Develop core platform services and back-end APIs
  • Identify gaps in available integration services and work on remediation strategies to ensure stability as the underlying platform technologies continue to evolve.

Minimum qualifications:

  • Fluent English (we speak english internally)
  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience as a Full Stack / Front End Developer / Back End Developer.
  • Experience developing and designing client-side or server-side applications.
  • Experience working with JavaScript.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with React or similar frameworks.
  • Experience with NodeJS
  • Experience with compiled, statically typed server technologies (C#, Java, Go, etc.).
  • Experience developing high load/high traffic user-facing software.
  • Experience with cloud technologies.
  • Experience with building, maintaining and optimizing responsive web apps.

Why Lexense?

We build our people up. Every team member is treated as a long-term investment and we do anything we can to help them excel in and out of work. Our greatest win is growing together.

We are doing something good with a real impact on our customers’ lives. We are on a mission to provide users with the platform they need to solve any legal dispute they have. Our platform offers them an effective and affordable solution to claim their legal rights.

We get the job done. Lexense employees are Do’ers - We drive the company forward, we move fast and we provide real value to our customers.

We enjoy each other's company, we learn from each other all the time and we never skip our happy hour.

  • We are committed to building an encouraging, caring, and supportive environment. We understand personal & family needs and we encourage our employees to be more than their jobs.
